text: Just a reminder, the show I have a piece in is opening tonight: <https://landpdx.com/2017/01/10/69-valentines-a-visual-tribute-to-the-magnetic-fields-opens-february-10-2017/>

attachments.title: 69 Valentines: A Visual Tribute To The Magnetic Fields opens February 10,Â 2017
attachments.text:
Join us for an opening reception on February 10, 2017 at 6pm.
The show is free and open to the public February 10 –March 19, 2017.
In 1999 the Magnetic Fields released their sixth album, 69 Love Songs. This three-volume, 69-track, genre-hopping opus explores the multifaceted phenomenon of the love song. Just in time for Valentine’s Day, we’re assembling 69+ amorous artists to create an original piece for each and every song on the album.

Featured Artists:
Sheri Rose Smith, Jake Hollomon, Meg Hunt, Cielle Charron, Mikey Burton, Jordan Hoagbin, Jennifer Daniel, Hiller Goodspeed, Alex DeSpain, Vanessa DeSpain, Mette Hornung Rankin, Kristin Rogers Brown, Stephanie Brachmann, Lisa Congdon, M. Sabine Rear, Jen Wick, Nathan Paul Rice, Kaley McKean, Ping Zhu, Emily Isabella, Evah Fan, Emily Skaer, Conrad Crespin, Erik Marinovich, Lindsay Eyth, Ron Liberti, BT Livermore, Lily Hudson, Jenny Tiffany, Little Friends of Printmaking, Molly Mendoza, Fran Krause, Jim Datz, Santiago Uceda, oof., John James Dudek, Drew Marshall, Marylou Faure, Katie West, Dan Cassaro, Susie Ghahremani, Tess Donohoe, Nolan Pelletier, Maggie Chiang, Rory Phillips, Robert Woodward, Kate Bingaman-Burt, Phillip Stewart, Michelle Leigh, Eva Landis, Kelsey Wroten, LK James, Llew Mejia, Ben Javens, Marlowe Dobbe, Kaye Blegvad, Zack Franceschi + Taryn Cowart, Reid Psaltis, Anthony Elder, Michael Buchino + Lowly Pencil, Cassandra Swan, Julia McNamara, Kinoko Evans, Bologna Sandwich, Lisa Brown, DOUG Studio, Jason Sturgill, Kathleen Marie, Rilla Alexander
